name: Horror Hotel: Mystery Quest
summary: You woke up in an unfamiliar room, enshrouded in darkness. You listen to the silence that's been broken only by the quiet static noise coming from the TV speakers. You try to remember how did you got here. But your memories are gone. You can't get rid of the feeling that something terrible has happened. Writings on the walls. The feeling of being watched. You can hear someone's voice through that static noise... Or is it just your imagination..?
